channel.title: Client Crashes When Opening Skillcape Shop Exions Source
channel.description:
I am using Exions source, I know he did fix this bug in his newer version but can't download it anymore. Anyway, when I try and open the skillcape shop the whole client crashes and the .bat gives me this error:
[img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/4048/lolxf.jpg[/img]
If you can help me fix this I will +rep you, thanks. :)

item.title: Client Crashes When Opening Skillcape Shop Exions Source
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

make sure you didnt stuff to many items into the shop, if you did, say the shop can 20 items and you put 25 in, then when you go to open the shop that would cause a crash.

Read full topic
item.source: Client Crashes When Opening Skillcape Shop Exions Source

item.description:
@damian24 wrote:

Hm, I have Exion client, but it is the new one if you want Pm me I can make it to a .rar file upload it to mediafire or something so u can download. All you gotta fix is the IPs.
